amendment.description: To provide for improved assessment of public-private competition for work performed by civilian employees of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2534 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2534 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12781-12782) To provide for improved assessment of public-private competition for work performed by civilian employees of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2534 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2534 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Kennedy.
